name: marfoldi
body:
## Hi!
My name is Péter Bence Márföldi, I do not use my middle name (Bence), so just call me Péter. I am doing my MSc in computer science at [Eötvös Loránd University](http://inf.elte.hu/). Mostly, I use Java for my work, but I also have some C++ experience. You can check my [GitHub repository](https://github.com/marfoldi) if you are intrested in my recent projects.

### Education & work experience
As I mentioned, I am a university student, but I am also working as a developer. For more information check my [resume](https://github.com/).

### Contact me
You can e-mail me at moc.limatoh@idlofram, or you can add me on [LinkedIn](https://hu.linkedin.com/in/marfoldi) and on [Facebook](https://facebook.com/marfoldi).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
